yeah the freezing problem makes it unplayable

ok, I've found a solution for the lag problem

1) When the lag starts, save your game and quit to windows.
2)Start cap lab again (If you get an error message, just ignore it)
3) If you get this error message, the game will freeze when you load your save
4) If this happens, just quit again
5) Start the game, load your save and now its back to normal

Do this every time the lag occurs, this is the only I've found to keep it playable
thank you for the upload Mr.Stif! Also thanks iancrz for taking some time to offer solution! The universe will reward you guys:)
